key.name: refresh-interval
key.description: How often to update the usage information (1-60 minutes)

key.name: command-timeout
key.description: Maximum time to wait for ccusage command to complete

key.name: ccusage-command
key.description: Command to execute for getting usage data

key.name: show-percentage
key.description: Display token usage percentage in the panel

key.name: use-api-fallback
key.description: Fall back to Anthropic API if ccusage fails

key.name: token-limit
key.description: Maximum tokens allowed per 5-hour session (Pro: 19000, Max5: 88000, Max20: 220000)

key.name: show-time-remaining
key.description: Display session time remaining in the panel

key.name: cost-limit
key.description: Maximum cost allowed per 5-hour session in USD (Pro: ~4.73, Max5: ~35, Max20: ~140)
